title: Why will my chat not connect?
body: Hi, for the past 24 hours my league client has been unable to connect to chat services. To the extent, I've logged off, gone to bed, woke up from a 8 hour sleep, to check and see if it is working again.. and it still wont connect me. help pls

replies.body: This is an issue we're currently looking into, where some players are having trouble connecting to chat.  I don't have an eta just yet, but we'll be providing updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) page.  In the meantime, some players were able to resolve this by logging off the Friends App.  Otherwise, hang tight!
